body_html: It applies to anything that calls _Check3DImage with require_static=True (the default). The require_static option should go away entirely. Looks like crop_to_bounding_box uses require_static=False, so it's clean.
body_text: It applies to anything that calls  _Check3DImage with require_static=True (the default).  The require_static option should go away entirely.  Looks like crop_to_bounding_box uses require_static=False, so it's clean.
body: It applies to anything that calls  `_Check3DImage` with `require_static=True` (the default).  The `require_static` option should go away entirely.  Looks like `crop_to_bounding_box` uses `require_static=False`, so it's clean.
